FormBase.name: Form orientation
FormBase.description: Determines the form orientation of input fields on the page.

FormBase.name: Label width
FormBase.description: Determines the width of the input fields on the page.

Widget.name: Align self
Widget.description: Float the element to the left or to the right.

DivContainer.name: Flex container
DivContainer.description: Sets the display type of the container to flex to align and distributes child elements within a flexible container.

DivContainer.name: Item gap
DivContainer.description: Adjust the space between items inside the flex container.

DivContainer.name: Align items X
DivContainer.description: Distributes space between and around content items along the X axis.

DivContainer.name: Align items Y
DivContainer.description: Distributes space between and around content items along the Y axis.

DivContainer.name: Grow / shrink items
DivContainer.description: Sets a responsive minimum width for its flex items.

DivContainer.name: Grow / shrink (self)
DivContainer.description: Defines whether it grows / shrinks relative to its parent based on available space. Use numbers to set a width relative to its siblings.

DivContainer.name: Default item size
DivContainer.description: Sets a preferred responsive size (flex-basis and minimum width) for its flex items.

DivContainer.name: Preferred size (self)
DivContainer.description: Sets a preferred responsive size (flex-basis and minimum width) for itself.

DivContainer.name: Background color
DivContainer.description: Change the background color of the container.

DivContainer.name: Borders
DivContainer.description: Show a border on specific sides only

DivContainer.name: Border radius
DivContainer.description: Set a border radius for rounded borders

DivContainer.name: Shadow
DivContainer.description: Add a shadow to this element

DivContainer.name: Align content (deprecated)
DivContainer.description: Align content of this element left, right or center it. Align elements inside the container as a row or as a column.

Button.name: Weight
Button.description: Emphasize the text with a heavier or lighter font weight

Button.name: Align icon
Button.description: Place the icon to the right or on top of the button.

Button.name: Full width
Button.description: Extend the button to the full width of the container it is placed in.

Button.name: Border
Button.description: Style the button with a transparent background, a colored border, and colored text.

ListView.name: Style
ListView.description: Change the appearance of rows in the list view.

ListView.name: Hover style
ListView.description: Highlight a row when hovering over it. Only useful when the row is clickable.

ListView.name: Row size
ListView.description: Change the row spacing of the list view.

LayoutGrid.name: Card style
LayoutGrid.description: Makes the columns appear as cards.

LayoutGrid.name: Background color
LayoutGrid.description: Change the background color of the columns.

LayoutGrid.name: Column gap
LayoutGrid.description: Sets a gap between the layout grid columns.

LayoutGrid.name: Row gap
LayoutGrid.description: Sets a gap between the layout grid rows.

LayoutGridRow.name: Cards style
LayoutGridRow.description: Makes the columns appear as cards.

LayoutGridRow.name: Background color
LayoutGridRow.description: Change the background color of the columns.

LayoutGridRow.name: Column gap
LayoutGridRow.description: Sets a gap between the layout grid columns.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Flex container
LayoutGridColumn.description: Sets the display type of the container to flex to align and distributes child elements within a flexible container.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Item gap
LayoutGridColumn.description: Adjust the space between items inside the flex container.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Align items X
LayoutGridColumn.description: Distributes space between and around content items along the X axis.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Align items Y
LayoutGridColumn.description: Distributes space between and around content items along the Y axis.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Grow / shrink
LayoutGridColumn.description: Sets a responsive minimum width for its flex items.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Default item size
LayoutGridColumn.description: Sets a preferred responsive size (flex-basis and minimum width) for its flex items.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Background color
LayoutGridColumn.description: Change the background color of the columns.

LayoutGridColumn.name: Borders
LayoutGridColumn.description: Show a border on specific sides only

LayoutGridColumn.name: Border radius
LayoutGridColumn.description: Set a border radius for rounded borders

LayoutGridColumn.name: Shadow
LayoutGridColumn.description: Add a shadow to this element

DataView.name: Background color
DataView.description: Change the background color of the main container.

DataView.name: Background footer
DataView.description: Change the background color of the footer.

DataGrid.name: Style
DataGrid.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the data grid.

DataGrid.name: Hover style
DataGrid.description: Enable data grid hover to make the rows hoverable.

DataGrid.name: Row size
DataGrid.description: Increase or decrease the row spacing of the data grid row.

TemplateGrid.name: Style
TemplateGrid.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the template grid.

TemplateGrid.name: Hover style
TemplateGrid.description: Enable template grid hover to make the rows hoverable.

GroupBox.name: Style
GroupBox.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the groupbox.

GroupBox.name: Callout style
GroupBox.description: Enable the groupbox callout functionality to highlight the importance of the groupbox.

StaticImageViewer.name: Style
StaticImageViewer.description: Choose the style of your image.

StaticImageViewer.name: Center
StaticImageViewer.description: Align the image in the center of an element.

DynamicImageViewer.name: Style
DynamicImageViewer.description: Choose the style of your image.

DynamicImageViewer.name: Center
DynamicImageViewer.description: Align the image in the center of an element.

Label.name: Style
Label.description: Change the appearance of a label.

TabContainer.name: Style
TabContainer.description: Change the appearance of the tab container

TabContainer.name: Tab position
TabContainer.description: Change the position of the tabs

DynamicText.name: Size
DynamicText.description: Make the text smaller or larger.

DynamicText.name: Weight
DynamicText.description: Emphasize the text with a heavier or lighter font weight

DynamicText.name: Color shade
DynamicText.description: Set the shade of the brand color.

DynamicText.name: Letter case
DynamicText.description: Change the letter case of the text.

DynamicText.name: Wrap options
DynamicText.description: Break long words and sentences into multiple lines.

Table.name: Style
Table.description: Change the appearance of cells in the table.

Table.name: Compact
Table.description: Change the spacing between cells to be compact.

com.mendix.widget.custom.badge.Badge.name: Style
com.mendix.widget.custom.badge.Badge.description: The brand style affecting this element's appearance.

com.mendix.widget.custom.badgebutton.Bad.description: The brand style affecting this element's appearance.

com.mendix.widget.custom.badgebutton.Bad.description: Style the button with a transparent background, a colored border, and colored text.

com.mendix.widget.custom.switch.Switch.name: Style
com.mendix.widget.custom.switch.Switch.description: The brand style affecting this element's appearance.

com.mendix.widget.custom.switch.Switch.name: Device style
com.mendix.widget.custom.switch.Switch.description: The general appearance of the switch. When no option selected iOS styles are applied

com.mendix.widget.custom.starrating.Star.name: Size
com.mendix.widget.custom.starrating.Star.description: Change size of the rating icon/image. Default is medium.

com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.name: Borders
com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.description: Change the border appearance. By default, only horizontal borders between groups are applied.

com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.name: Striped
com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.description: Add alternating background colors to groups in the accordion.

com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.name: Compact
com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.description: Make groups in the accordion more compact.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Align content
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Align content of this element left, right or center it. Align elements inside the container as a row or as a column.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Image fit
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Change the fit of the image.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Opacity
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Change the opacity of the image.

com.mendix.widget.custom.slider.Slider.name: Style
com.mendix.widget.custom.slider.Slider.description: The brand style affecting this element's appearance.

com.mendix.widget.web.tooltip.Tooltip.name: Show inline
com.mendix.widget.web.tooltip.Tooltip.description: Show the widget as an inline element.

com.mendix.widget.custom.RangeSlider.Ran.name: Style
com.mendix.widget.custom.RangeSlider.Ran.description: The brand style affecting this element's appearance.
